entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
